summary: Provides a suite of unit tests for the Whisper standalone decoder model, checking its configuration, correct processing of past key/value states and attention masks, generation behavior when input IDs are omitted, proper gradient propagation through hidden states and attentions, and successful save/load cycles with fast initialization.
business_intent: Guarantee the functional integrity and robustness of the Whisper decoder component used in speech recognition pipelines, supporting reliable deployment and easier maintenance through automated regression testing.
